It’s critical that everyone stays informed about the coronavirus and what you can do to protect yourself from it. Here are some helpful tips from the CDC and my friend @RepUnderwood, who also happens to be a nurse. https://twitter.com/repunderwood/status/1233438565641707520 QT @RepUnderwood Want to help prevent the spread of coronavirus? Here’s what the CDC suggests:
➡Avoid close contact w/people who are sick
➡Avoid touching your eyes, nose, & mouth
➡Stay home when you are sick
➡Cover your cough or sneeze w/ a tissue, then throw tissue in the trash
